name: CookBeat
description:
CookBeat is an Android rhythm cooking game where the genre of rhythm games and cooking games is mixed. This is a game where the possibility of mixing rhythm and cooking is achieved, and is done so by having the main character (you) attempt cooking with only musical knowledge. The dish you will be cooking will be Neapolitan Spaghetti.

This is a team collaboration project and is developed under KDU games

Credits : Lum Wai Hoeh, Chan Yit Fei, Ooi Yee Soon, Lee Li Xuan, Nadrah Azaman
